publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3458 Margaret Smith: Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Pilton Citizens Advice Bureau as it celebrates its 25th anniversary; notes that the advice work delivered by local volunteers in 2004-05 resulted in £85,000 in financial gain for clients; applauds the volunteers for the innovative outreach work that takes advice out to the community, including to local homeless people and students at Telford College; recognises the vital role that it and other citizens advice bureaux around the country play in their local communities, and wishes it every success for the future in providing free, impartial advice to the people of Edinburgh. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Bill Butler*, Jackie Baillie*, Mike Pringle*, Colin Fox*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Christine Grahame*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Margo MacDonald*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Patrick Harvie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-3458 Margaret Smith: Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary—That the Parliament congratulates Pilton Citizens Advice Bureau as it celebrates its 25th anniversary; notes that the advice work delivered by local volunteers in 2004-05 resulted in £85,000 in financial gain for clients; applauds the volunteers for the innovative outreach work that takes advice out to the community, including to local homeless people and students at Telford College; recognises the vital role that it and other citizens advice bureaux around the country play in their local communities, and wishes it every success for the future in providing free, impartial advice to the people of Edinburgh. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Eleanor Scott, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Robin Harper, Bill Butler, Jackie Baillie, Mike Pringle, Colin Fox, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Nora Radcliffe, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jim Wallace, Christine Grahame, Mark Ballard, Margo MacDonald, Donald Gorrie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Patrick Harvie, Trish Godman, Tommy Sheridan
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Pauline McNeill*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3458 Pilton CAB Jubilee Anniversary (lodged on 25 October 2005) Frances Curran*
